summary: Re-proved main_provable_iff_valid in Metalogic_v2. ContextProvability.lean now uses new main_provable_iff_valid_v2 from SemanticCanonicalModel.lean, removing dependency on old Metalogic. Created Closure.lean, FiniteWorldState.lean, and SemanticCanonicalModel.lean. Lake build succeeds.

Subformula closure infrastructure for finite model construction
Finite world state and history structures
Updated to use Metalogic_v2 infrastructure (no old Metalogic import)
Implementation summary with changes, limitations, and future work

next_steps: Review implementation summary. Known sorries in supporting lemmas should be addressed in future tasks. Consider porting Formula.subformulas to Bimodal.Syntax to eliminate remaining old Metalogic dependencies.
